title: GET UP, GET AFTER IT, NO MORE EXCUSES - Powerful Motivational Speech (Featuring Marcus A. Taylor)
itunes:title: GET UP, GET AFTER IT, NO MORE EXCUSES - Powerful Motivational Speech (Featuring Marcus A. Taylor)
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
OUR 300TH PODCAST EPISODE!


GET UP, GET AFTER IT, NO MORE EXCUSES! Start now and get after it, your goals don't care about how you feel. Get it done. One of the Best Motivational Speeches Ever featuring Marcus Elevation Taylor.


"If you woke up this morning, you have another opportunity to begin again."


Speaker:


Marcus Taylor: http://bit.ly/38FUFoS


Music:


Audiomachine


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
